summary: A baby dinoshark evolves into a ferocious predatory adult, terrorising tourists and locals offshore from Puerto Vallarta, Mexico.
cast: Eric Balfour|Iva Hasperger|Aarón Díaz|Dan Golden|Humberto Busto|Guillermo Iván|Roger Corman|Christina Nicole|Richard Miller|Liv Boughn|Robert Roessel|Gary J. Tunnicliffe|Erika Zinser|Cindy Mazer|Sara Kova|Benjamin Woodlock|Jack Everest Hite|David Ford Hite|Anna Marie Laurita|Mike Lawrence|Christian Gomez|Victor Cruz|Blythe Metz|Alex Andriadis|Michelle Klyne|Katharine Wilhelm|Brian Covarrubias Hernandez|Jake Bader|Morgan Adams|Sydney Kristine Spear|David Wulff|Estampas de Mexico|Patrick Bradford|Ethan O'Neill|Adam Blake Finer
title: Dinoshark
